name: Liquid Mongoose
overview:
Liquid Mongoose provides consumer facing web applications to solve simple problems.

Paper Case is a bookmarklet that converts webpages on Netflix, AOL Music, and Picasa web albums into a page that can be printed and folded to be used as CD and DVD cases.

Transitly is a mobile web application for mass transit. It is optimized for mobile device’s web browsers, specifically Android and iOS, as well as a native Android app version. The application saves and displays user’s most commonly used route, stop, and direction combination to give daily commuters quick access to this information.

DVDLater is a single page web application that displays movies that are upcoming, coming soon to theaters, or are currently in theaters and allows users to save these movies to their Netflix Queue in a single click. The site was built to fill the void of a “In Theaters” section on the Netflix Website.

BarackBerry is a political satire website of fictional email messages to and from President Barack Obama.
